system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.iHruvh0FiUFh3EDH]{Distance Rifle Specialist}

Benefits

Once per round, when making a single shot attack with a bolt action or sniper rifle, the character gains a +8 bonus to attack. This attack must be the only attack the character makes this round.

Special

This feat can also be used with the bonuses from the Dead Aim, and Marksman Shot.
